plot: A slacker's life is saved from an impending robot revolution when he purchases a "Live Strong"-inspired bracelet in support of the "Robot Movement."
title: The Bracelet
plot_es: A slacker's life is saved from an impending robot revolution when he purchases a "Live Strong"-inspired bracelet in support of the "Robot Movement."
plot_en: A slacker's life is saved from an impending robot revolution when he purchases a "Live Strong"-inspired bracelet in support of the "Robot Movement."
